modules.title: Getting Started with C++
modules.description: Introduction to C++ basics and setting up the environment.

steps.content: C++ is a powerful general-purpose programming language. Learn how to install a C++ compiler like GCC or Visual Studio and write your first "Hello, World!" program.

steps.question: What is the correct syntax to output "Hello, World!" in C++?

modules.title: Variables and Data Types
modules.description: Understanding variables, data types, and basic operations in C++.

steps.content: Variables store data in C++. Common data types include int, float, double, char, and bool. Learn how to declare and initialize variables.
